name: Dragon Glide
description:
There is a war going on between the dragon classes. You must steal all the eggs on your journey to your nest. Made for the primitive game jam and I admit I must have stretched the imagination there with 'primitive', as everything is made up of triangles, squares, and ovals.

It is a mash up between Joust and a runner styled game. It was created specifically for the Primitive Game Jam.

https://itch.io/jam/primitive-game-jam/results

Donations are welcomed, will encourage us to provide updates and go further down the rabbit hole of game development.
